source_objects.description: Become a database expert with these courses ranging from basic SQL to Hadoop and Oracle mastery.
source_objects.title: Database Design & Development

items.title: Neo4j Crash Course - 11 Days of Cypher | Learn By Examples
items.headline: Learn the Neo4j Cypher Query Language Quick and Fast! Build Graph Databases Like a Pro & Apply it in Your Next Project.
objectives_summary: Learn to use Neo4j professionally
Learn advanced Neo4j features
Learn Neo4j like a pro by writing your own Cypher

items.title: MongoDB for Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Oak
visible_instructors.job_title: Web & Mobile Development, IOS, Android, Ethical Hacking, IT
visible_instructors.title: Oak Academy

items.headline: Learn NoSQL database MongoDB from scratch, create modern databases for your projects using MongoDB and Mongoose!
objectives_summary: Learn the most used, open-source document database, and NoSQL database aka MongoDB
Install MongoDB
Logic behind the MongoDB data storage

items.title: Learning Path: Big Data Analytics and Streaming with Spark 2
items.headline: Get the most out of the trending big data framework for all your data processing needs
objectives_summary: Introduction to Apache Hadoop and Spark
Understand the Spark API and its architecture
Find out how to load and save data in Spark

items.title: LEARNING PATH: Docker: Guide to Become a Docker Professional
items.headline: Know the art of containerizing your applications using Docker and enhance the software development process
objectives_summary: Containerize a web-based application with a base container and automate it using Dockerfile
Orchestrate, deploy, and scale a complex application using Docker Compose and Docker Machine
Get to know the software defined networking architecture used in Docker, which includes single-host and multi-host networking

items.title: Build SQL Queries with Excel from scratch
items.headline: Learn how to build SQL Bulk Queries using Excel
objectives_summary: Setup Database Server
Create  Table
Prep Sample Excel Data

items.title: Solving 10 Hadoop'able Problems
items.headline: Need solutions to your big data problems? Here are 10 real-world projects demonstrating problems solved using Hadoop.
objectives_summary: Explore the Hadoop big data Ecosystem in a nutshell
Process payment data from an event stream using the streaming API: Payment Analyzer
Detect BOT traffic using Spark Streaming, make log data queryable, and investigate customer data

items.title: SQL for Dummies, BA, DA, developers and Job Seekers
items.headline: course for Business Analyst, Data Analysts,DBA, .Net developers
objectives_summary: You will learn how to: install and query on SQL Server
Importance of E-R modeling and Normalization
Retrieve, delete, insert  and update Data(SELECT INTO, AND, OR , NOT, ORDER BY)

items.title: From Zero to R Hero - learning R programming by doing
items.headline: Learn R using real datasets and hands-on activities
objectives_summary: Learn core technical skills within R
Perform data pre-processing and error checking
How to perform a variety of statistical analyses using R

items.title: Comprehensive Course on MariaDB

objectives_summary: Downloading and Installing MariaDB
MariaDB Conditions
Insert Data, Select Data, Select Limit, Update Data, Delete Data,

items.headline: Course by Mohanakrishnan R
objectives_summary: Purpose of DBMS
Normalization Overview
EF Codd's Rule overview

items.title: Machine Learning Algorithms: Basics to Advanced
items.headline: Learn how to use Pandas and master the advanced algorithms to excel in Machine Learning
objectives_summary: Master concepts involved in interacting with databases.
Learn to apply multiple and different functions to dataframe columns.
Implement the concept of exponentially weighted windows.

items.title: Azure SQL For beginners:  SQL,T-SQL, SSMS, Azure Data Studio
items.headline: Provision and interact with SQL Server Database in the Cloud.
objectives_summary: Setup Free Azure Account
How to access Azure Services
How to provision an azure SQL Database Server

items.title: SQL Challenges: Learn SQL by solving challenging problems
items.headline: Solve 120 challenging real world SQL problems and improve your SQL skills.

items.headline: Learn in this course how to set up a real indexing strategy on your tables to get better performance
objectives_summary: Improve performance, through the implementation of indexes on your tables :)

items.title: Complete Mysql tutorial + Learning 16 complex queries
items.headline: Learn Mysql by creating an e-commerce project database and creating 16 complex queries
objectives_summary: You will how to work with mysql databases from scratch
You will learn how to use structured query language for creating tables, columns and keys
